TextLibrary.Text: Jarl
Jarl, this has gone on long enough. You and Jotun need to stop stealing each other's things.
Jarl, this has gone on long enough. You and Jotun need to stop stealing each other's things.
Jarl, this has gone on long enough. You and Jotun need to stop stealing each other's things.
Jarl, this has gone on long enough. You and Jotun need to stop stealing each other's things.
Jotun started it.
Jotun started it.
Jotun started it.
Jotun started it.
It doesn't matter who started it. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
It doesn't matter who started it. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
It doesn't matter who started it. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
It doesn't matter who started it. If I can get you both to agree, will you stop?
If Jotun signs an agreement on a Griffonskin parchment, then I will agree.
If Jotun signs an agreement on a Griffonskin parchment, then I will agree.
If Jotun signs an agreement on a Griffonskin parchment, then I will agree.
If Jotun signs an agreement on a Griffonskin parchment, then I will agree.
Where do I get a Griffonskin parchment?
Where do I get a Griffonskin parchment?
Where do I get a Griffonskin parchment?
Where do I get a Griffonskin parchment?
There is a Goblin Merchant in the city of Gruuldok, in Kor. He has many rare things. He will sell you one.

Fine. I'll meet you on neutral ground, down at Giants' Walk, when I return.
